content:
this is a set of two door stoppers have a look at the dog 1 these two characters also make huggable draggable cuddle-able toys **materials **
- 5 oz assorted colors - bits of red black and white - dacron batting - 2 1/2 lbs dry beans - yarn needle > previously available at the crochet works http //www sarahanns com/crochetworks/dawg html 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/guard-dawg
